subject: Grant of Honorarium to Inquiry Officers/ Presenting Officers in the Departmental Inquiries
text: HRa 75 rTHN qferaz<ot (7gq5 4Raev er TTHRf TA4, HRa TAR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) 874 T 0il-5 Q 6, {qc7-10, &RGT, 75f @arit 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 T/Phone 91-11-25074100 / 25074200 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Administration/2023 Policy Circular No 1.3.1.28/ 2023 dated 19th 2023 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. NHAI/11014/22/2023-Admn (Comp. No. 199036)} ADDENDUM Sub: Grant of Honorarium to Inquiry Officers/ Presenting Officers in the departmental inquiries reg: In continuation to NHAI Policy Circular No. 1.3.1.27/2023 dated 12.05.2023, the following para may be added to the aforesaid circular: 'Member (Admn:) has been delegated power to grant honorarium to IA & PO within the limits prescribed by DoP&T read with CVCs instructions in this regard. 2 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: Islos) 23 (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQV ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 .
